General.Name: Xiamen C&D Inc
General.Description: Xiamen C&D Inc. engages in the supply chain and real estate development businesses in China and internationally. Its supply chain operations include the logistics purchase and planning, warehousing site selection and facilities supporting, risk management of property in goods, reverse supply chain, customized, and inventory management and value-added services. The company also provides real estate development, agency construction and transportation, urban renewal and renovation, property management, construction, and business management services, as well as involved in the industrial investment business. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Xiamen, China.

8.Name: Mr. Ming Jian  Lin
8.Title: Gen. Mang. of Auditing Department and Employee-Representative of the Supervisory Board
